WorkItem.ClosedComment: User misconception, pane shows averaged values
WorkItem.Description:
I switched the Bosshandler to 85 so my Defense stats schould look the same as in the WoW arsenal.
 
Allthough, on Rawr I get a Dodge Rating of 1612.191 (13.3314%) unbuffed
And on the Armory and in game I only have 1492 dodge rating (12.78%)
This seems a bit odd.
 
The link to my toon is: http://eu.battle.net/wow/de/character/die-silberne-hand/Schroom/advanced

Comments.Message:
Notice the .191 
This typically means you have an averaged proc in there or two.  If the character has Windwalker enchant, as well as trinkets that are proc/on use, this will be the discrepancy since you can't see this on the in-game character sheet

yes setting my weapon enchant from Windwalk to none resolved the issue.

although I don't think this is how it should work.  Windwalk is a proc with an up-time of about 30%.
and gives 600 dodge rating, So I believe there is only an average shown in rawr.

as a tank although I want to see the worst case scenario and check if I'm still block caped when this worst case scenario happens.

an option to enable the proc would be a nice gimmick then, so I could compare, worst and best case.

although showing an average of a procc, and putting it into the calculation  just doesn't seem right for me.
